p.span: As a reminder, Spring Break will be Monday, March 16, 2020 through Monday, March 27, 2020. Dr. John Hossler, County Health Director, has requested an additional week of school closure for the week of Monday, March 30, 2020 through Friday, April 3, 2020. Students will tentatively return to school on Monday, April 6, 2020.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

p.span: At this time, there is NO case of COVID-19 in Jefferson or the surrounding counties.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

p.span: There will be a meeting on Monday, April 1, 2020 with Dr. John Hossler of the Jefferson County Health Department to determine the best course of action moving forward over the next few weeks concerning the Coronavirus. The situation will be monitored one week at a time with the guidance of our local health professionals, as well as, state level officials.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

p.span: As always, we encourage everyone to practice self-care and proactive hygiene practices. If you plan to travel, please be sure to monitor the health of your family.

ul.li: Most important: take a nature hike for fresh air and sunshine (This can be fishing, bike riding, stomping in puddles)

p.span: Dear Families of Canaan Community Academy Students:

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux
x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

ul.li: Administration is working closely with Jefferson County Health Department and following/sharing state (DOE & health department) and national (CDC) information

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

ul.li: CCA currently has a hand sanitizing station at the entrance of the school and all entering are expected to sanitize hands to prevent the spread of the flu and viruses.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

ul.li: Students are also expected to sanitize their hands when they get on the bus each morning.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

ul.li: Students and visitors will also sanitize hands when entering/exiting the building too.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

ul.li: The buses and the school are receiving extra disinfecting.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

ul.li: Students are also being encouraged to wash their hands correctly and frequently.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

ul.li: On Monday, Nurse Buchanan presented hand washing information and fielded questions concerning the students' concerns about the coronavirus.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux
x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

ul.li: Being closely monitored and staff will continue to make calls home checking on students.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux
x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

ul.li: If at any time a student or employee would be presumed to have COVID-19 you would be notified, through REMIND, social media, Class DOJO, phone calls to parents/guardians and a letter sent home. Plus, Jefferson County Health Department would be notified.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

ul.li: Please follow the attached guidelines for when a student needs to stay home and when they are ready to return to school.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

ul.li: Please do NOT send a backpack to school with your child until further notice

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

ul.li: Please encourage your child to wash his/her hands correctly and frequently.

em.strong: Level 1 - The virus has been confirmed to be spreading in the United States

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

ul.li: Emphasize hand-washing and general cleanliness ( students will use hand sanitizer when boarding the bus)

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

ul.li: Everyone entering the building will use sanitizer on hands or wash hands if sensitive to hand sanitizer

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

ul.li: Encourage covering mouths when coughing/sneezing

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

ul.li: Encourage kids and employees to stay home if sick

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

ul.li: Students will not be permitted to bring backpacks to school

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

ul.li: Students stop sharing coats and/or clothing

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-61 c1-62 c1-b c1-7r c1-7s c1-7t c1-7u c1-7v x-d-ux

ul.li: High-touch areas will be cleaned multiple times daily including buses after each route
